BodyName: Committee on Women and Gender Equity

Items.Title: Oversight - Oversight: The Mayor’s Office to End Domestic and Gender-Based Violence and COVID-19.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Oversight: The Mayor’s Office to End Domestic and Gender-Based Violence and COVID-19.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to establishing a working group, feasibility study and pilot program on using community locations to provide domestic violence survivors access to the internet
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a working group, feasibility study and pilot program on using community locations to provide domestic violence survivors access to the internet.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Rosenthal, Dinowitz, Gibson and Public Advocate Williams

Items.Title: Oversight - Oversight: The Mayor’s Office to End Domestic and Gender-Based Violence and COVID-19.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Oversight: The Mayor’s Office to End Domestic and Gender-Based Violence and COVID-19.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to establishing a working group, feasibility study and pilot program on using community locations to provide domestic violence survivors access to the internet
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a working group, feasibility study and pilot program on using community locations to provide domestic violence survivors access to the internet.
